data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In the minute 2, Free kick Coritiba.
Goal! Flamengo have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Bruno Henrique.
Giorgian De Arrascaeta with an assist there.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio do Maracana.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Flamengo throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Coritiba drive upfield and Robson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
In the minute 6, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Flamengo's area.
In the minute 9, Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In Rio de Janeiro, Everton Ribeiro of Flamengo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 11, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
Flamengo push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Leo Pereira gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Coritiba defence.
Leo Pereira (Flamengo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 12, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 15, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Flamengo.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Coritiba are pushing forward but Robson's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Vitinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Flamengo.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 20, Gerson of Flamengo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Flamengo.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 25, Flamengo's Bruno Henrique misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in Coritiba.
In the minute 26, Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 27, Great finish from Giorgian De Arrascaeta to give Flamengo a 2-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Mauricio Isla.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flamengo drives forward and Everton Ribeiro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Vitinho (Flamengo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 31, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 34, Coritiba's Sabino has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
Important block from the Coritiba defence as Vitinho fires in a strike for Flamengo.
Flamengo's Gerson breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 36, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Coritiba.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Flamengo.
Willian Arao (Flamengo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a Coritiba throw-in in Flamengo's half.
Everton Ribeiro (Flamengo) gets in a strike â€“ but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 39, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick Coritiba.
In the minute 41, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Flamengo.
So close for Flamengo as Bruno Henrique's shot comes back off the post.
Nathan Silva (Coritiba) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Coritiba.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In Rio de Janeiro Flamengo drive forward through Vitinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Rio de Janeiro.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro has blown to start the second-half.
The away team replace Mailton with Jonathan.
In the minute 46, Rodrigo Santana (Coritiba) is making a second substitution, with Yan Sasse replacing Matheus Galdezani.
Bruno Henrique's header is off-target for Flamengo.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 47, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Vitinho (Flamengo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Flamengo pushes forward through Bruno Henrique, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Rio de Janeiro Flamengo attack through Bruno Henrique. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 49, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Coritiba.
Flamengo are coming forward and Everton Ribeiro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Coritiba's William Matheus attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 53, Flamengo have a goal kick.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio do Maracana.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
In the minute 56, Giorgian De Arrascaeta for Flamengo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick Flamengo.
In the minute 58, Leo Pereira's header is off-target for Flamengo.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Bruno Henrique is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 62, Coritiba drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Bruno Henrique is back on his feet again.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Flamengo.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flamengo to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Willian Arao (Flamengo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 68, Rodolfo (Coritiba) has received a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced Nathan Silva with Brayan Lucumi. This is the third substitution made today by Rodrigo Santana.
Coritiba make their fourth substitution with Mattheus replacing Osman.
In the minute 70, Throw-in Coritiba.
Flamengo drive upfield and Vitinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
Can Flamengo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Coritiba's half?
In the minute 71, Throw-in high up the field for Flamengo in Rio de Janeiro.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Goal! Flamengo extend their lead to 3-0 through Rene.
Vitinho instrumental with a fine assist.
Bruno Henrique for Flamengo drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 78, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Ricardo Marques Ribeiro.
Coritiba needs to be cautious. Flamengo have an attacking throw-in.
Diego is replacing Gerson for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 79, Rogerio Ceni is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Lazaro replacing Everton Ribeiro.
Flamengo's Vitinho gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
The away team have replaced Robson with Matheus Bueno. This is the fifth substitution made today by Rodrigo Santana.
In the minute 81, Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Matheus Franca is replacing Mauricio Isla for the home team.
Michael is on a sub for Bruno Henrique for Flamengo.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
Pedro Rocha is replacing Vitinho for the home team.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Coritiba.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Matheus Sales (Coritiba) gets a yellow card.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Ricardo Marques Ribeiro signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
Coritiba are back in the match in Rio de Janeiro. Mattheus has scored to make it 3-1.
Great play from Giovanni Augusto to set up the goal.
